name: ldss_website
description: A modern school management platform built to streamline academic, administrative, and communication workflows. The LDSS brand uses a **green primary palette (Hex #1B5E20)** to reflect the official uniform color across the UI and marketing assets.

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
